query:
SELECT e.id, e.tipoEvento, e.dataEvento, e.dataEventoFim, e.local, l.nome as localNome
FROM eventos e
LEFT JOIN locais l ON e.local = l.id
WHERE e.turmaId = (SELECT id FROM turmas WHERE codigo = '654')
ORDER BY e.dataEvento;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT e.id, e.tipoEvento, e.dataEvento, e.dataEventoFim, e.local, l.nome as localNome
FROM eventos e
LEFT JOIN locais l ON e.local = l.id
WHERE e.turmaId = (SELECT id FROM turmas WHERE codigo = '654')
ORDER BY e.dataEvento;
